fields.summary: [PRPL OJO_Nokia] [WIFI] WPS Methods - Client PIN is not working on both bands

fields.Action: Using Jumpstart on the WiFi station, generate an 8-digits Client PIN
fields.Expected Result: The Client PIN is generated via Jumpstart

fields.Action: Access the Web-UI and insert the Client PIN in the "Client PIN Method" section with reference to the WiFi 2.4Ghz private network (a drop-down list should be available in order to select the required band SSID), then press the "connect" button
fields.Expected Result: The Wifi Client is connected to the Wifi 2.4GHz SSID

fields.Action: Perform internet browsing on the client
fields.Expected Result: Internet browsing is successful on the client

fields.description:
[Precondition]

	1xWiFi 2.4GHz WPS capable station available, with Jumpstart installed

	 

	WiFi 5GHz disabled on the DUT


[Description]

	The WPS Client PIN method must be available and working
fields.summary: [Wi-FiFunctional] WPS Methods - Client PIN (2.4GHz Band)

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
